localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: PixelMixer is a secure video hosting site and we have recently added support for importing your Zoom video recordings so you can save them for later, search their transcripts, edit with our embedded video editor, or share them with others.
blogPost.body: PixelMixer is a secure video hosting site and we have recently added support for importing your Zoom video recordings so you can save them for later, search their transcripts, edit with our embedded video editor, or share them with others.
blogPost.title: PixelMixer - Save, search, and share your Zoom Recordings
blogPost.author: PixelMixer

localize.description: PixelMixer是一个安全的视频托管网站，我们最近添加了对导入Zoom视频记录的支持，这样您就可以保存它们以备以后使用、搜索它们的抄本、使用我们的嵌入式视频编辑器进行编辑或与其他人共享它们。
localize.tagline: 保存、搜索和共享缩放录制

localize.description: PixelMixer是一個安全的視頻託管網站，我們最近添加了對導入Zoom視頻記錄的支持，這樣您就可以保存它們以備以後使用、搜索它們的抄本、使用我們的嵌入式視頻編輯器進行編輯或與其他人共享它們。
localize.tagline: 保存、搜索和共享縮放錄製

previous.excerpt: Pageturner is a free community for readers and people building their reading habit. Reading in public and sharing your notes lets you discover interesting ideas and keeps you accountable.
previous.title: Pageturner - Let's build a reading habit, together

localize.description: Pageturner是一个免费的社区，为读者和人们建立他们的阅读习惯。公开阅读和分享你的笔记，让你发现有趣的想法，并让你负责任。
localize.tagline: 让我们一起养成阅读的习惯吧

localize.description: Pageturner是一個免費的社區，爲讀者和人們建立他們的閱讀習慣。公開閱讀和分享你的筆記，讓你發現有趣的想法，並讓你負責任。
localize.tagline: 讓我們一起養成閱讀的習慣吧

next.excerpt: Follab is a platform for collect, organize and analyze customer feedback. No more outdated spreadsheets, caothic Trello boards or try to keep track of everything in Slack.
next.title: Follab - Capture, organize, and analyze customer feedback

localize.description: Follab是一个收集、整理和分析客户反馈的平台。不再有过时的电子表格、caothic的Trello板或试图在Slack中跟踪一切。
localize.tagline: 收集、整理、分析客户反馈

localize.description: Follab是一個收集、整理和分析客戶反饋的平臺。不再有過時的電子表格、caothic的Trello板或試圖在Slack中跟蹤一切。
localize.tagline: 收集、整理、分析客戶反饋
